settings.text: Pick a fixed amount above, or choose $1 and enter the total sale amount below as a quantity:
(Tap the number field to enter exact digits)
Credit card payments will require a shipping address, but it will only be used to verify the card. No shipping will be applied.
Express payment options (buttons above for PayPal, Apple Pay, etc) will not require any billing info manual entry.
